title: The Resignation Letter
description:
This is an alternate cover edition for ASIN:
B01MS9NU7F
Amalthea has always broken the rules. She applied for the Academy of Mages. Once there, she broke their taboo on studying certain magics. Then, she falls in love with the Empress. But when the Empress asks her to break the rules of her own ethics, Amalthea must make a difficult choice.
author: Dax Murray
